tooltip.cai.gdcz_sword.text.0: General attack launches ”chain of wires“, attacking entities of the same kind
tooltip.cai.gdcz_sword.text.1: Right - click”Arrow Rain“to launch multiple beams
tooltip.cai.gdcz_sword.text.2: Why is the red blood that makes people's blood boil called ghosts
tooltip.cai.gdcz_sword.text.6: GeneralAttack and SkillEffects are affected by enchantment(fire aspect,Sweeping,sharpness)
tooltip.cai.soul_talisman.text.0: Post-wear attacks have a 1% physical Health BloodSuckingEffect
tooltip.cai.soul_talisman.text.1: While holding a Murasama, all attack effects will also have additional bloodSuckingEffects
tooltip.cai.soul_talisman.text.2: A wisp of soul, a spring and autumn
tooltip.cai.soul_talisman.text.6: If you do not want the particle effect, click on 'Toggle Visibility'
tooltip.cai.anli.text.0: Accumulator weapon: Hold this sword and sneak to accumulate power
tooltip.cai.anli.text.1: General attack launched ”cloud Xi cross cut“, the longer the storage power, the higher the attack
tooltip.cai.anli.text.2: Right - click to launch the ”day wave Xi recruit to come“, summon the same sound boom as the wave
tooltip.cai.anli.text.3: Wave Xi wave xi dynasty cloud xi
tooltip.cai.star_data.text.4: §cPlease don't search for constellations in the rain.
tooltip.cai.star_data.text.5: §cPlease search for constellations during the specified time (13:00-23:00).
tooltip.cai.star_data.text.6: §cPeople always need to look at a higher level
tooltip.cai.star_data.text.7: §bYou get a star relative to your coordinates
tell.anningui.interesting.mana.need.0: A tank with liquid mana is required
